description: This file is a JavaScript module providing a client API for interacting with backend services related to students, academics, classes, subjects, teachers, and reports in an academic management system. It contains functions for performing CRUD operations and data retrieval, configuration-based environment handling, and placeholder behaviors for client-only mode.

methods.name: buildUrl(path = '')
methods.description: Constructs the complete URL for API requests, appending the given path to the base URL from config if it exists.

methods.name: request(path, options = {})
methods.description: Performs fetch calls to the specified URL with given options, handling JSON and text responses, and error handling.

methods.name: healthCheck()
methods.description: Checks the health of the API endpoint; returns a default message if baseUrl is not configured.

methods.name: listStudents
methods.description: Fetches the list of students from the backend or returns an empty array in client-only mode.

methods.name: createStudent
methods.description: Creates a new student record via the backend or returns a temporary object in client-only mode.

methods.name: updateStudent
methods.description: Updates a student record via the backend or returns a merged object in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteStudent
methods.description: Deletes a student record via the backend or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: listExams
methods.description: Retrieves a list of exams from the backend or returns an empty list if in client-only mode.

methods.name: createExam
methods.description: Creates an exam record or returns a temporary record in client-only mode.

methods.name: updateExam
methods.description: Updates an exam record or returns a merged object in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteExam
methods.description: Deletes an exam record or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: listSubjects
methods.description: Fetches subjects from backend or returns default minimal subjects in client-only mode.

methods.name: listStudentsForClassSection
methods.description: Retrieves students for a specific class-section or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: listMarks
methods.description: Fetches marks for an exam and class-section or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: upsertMarks
methods.description: Updates or inserts marks, returns server result or mock data in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteMark
methods.description: Deletes a mark record or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: getStudentReport
methods.description: Retrieves a student's report for an exam or returns a default report in client-only mode.

methods.name: listClasses
methods.description: Retrieves list of classes or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: createClass
methods.description: Creates a class record or returns a mock object in client-only mode.

methods.name: updateClass
methods.description: Updates a class record or returns a merged object in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteClass
methods.description: Deletes a class or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: listSubjects(classId)
methods.description: Fetches subjects for a class or returns empty in client-only mode.

methods.name: createSubject
methods.description: Creates a subject for a class or returns a mock object in client-only mode.

methods.name: updateSubject
methods.description: Updates a class subject record or returns a merged object in client-only mode.

methods.name: deleteSubject
methods.description: Deletes a class subject or returns success in client-only mode.

methods.name: listTeachers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of teachers or returns placeholder data in client-only mode.

methods.name: assignSubjectToClass
methods.description: Assigns a subject to a class, returning a mock record or performing a real API call.

methods.name: assignTeacherToSubjectInClass
methods.description: Assigns a teacher to a class subject or returns success in client-only mode.

ctags.name: path
ctags.pattern: /^      const path = api.academics.endpoints.listMarks({ examId, klass, section });$/
